name: Derived Grade
title: Derived Grade
rows:
G1: Mitotic count (per 2mm2) less than 2 AND 
        Ki-67 index (%) less than 3

Stated as WHO Grade 1

G2: Mitotic count (per 2mm2) equal 2-20 OR
        Ki-67 index (%) equal 3-20

Stated as WHO Grade 2

G3: Mitotic count (per 2mm2) greater than 20 OR 
    Ki-67 index (%) greater than 20

Stated as WHO Grade 3
